welcome: This ERP Single Page Application  was created as part of my thesis for Eszterházy Károly University.
about: You can keep track of your employees, purchase items in order to maintain your stock holdings and be in touch with your suppliers.
employeeFunc: You can maintain your employee's profile, add appropriate roles to them, depending on their task to be fulfilled!
supplierFunc: You can add new suppliers and keep detailed information of them!
itemFunc: You can create new items, set the retail price and unit cost, keep track of both incoming and on hand quantities!
orderFunc: You can purchase needed items from earlier defined suppliers, modify requested orders, approve and receive created orders!
